video.title: El Cartel
video.synopsis: One man makes a fateful decision to get involved with a Colombian drug cartel in this series based on a novel by Andrés López López.

episodes.synopsis: Schoolmates Martín and Pepe begin their work in the drug business. Meanwhile, narco boss Oscar faces new responsibilities and receives troubling news.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: A death gives Oscar reason to celebrate, Martín attends an important meeting, and Pepe makes a discovery that could have lasting implications.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Susana's confession enrages Mocho, Martín has a small reunion, Oscar receives some tough news, Pepe falls hard, and Nacho gives an order.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Bodegón visits Nacho in prison, Eliana gives Pepe some surprising news, Oscar plans a brutal revenge, and Sofía delivers an ultimatum.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: As the battle to fill the power vacuum continues, Pepe and Martín uncover a dangerous secret. Meanwhile, Sofía receives an honor.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Oscar is asked to strike a bargain, Sofía suffers a setback, Martín considers making a change, and Eliana delivers unexpected news.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Pepe and Martín disagree about a shipment, Eliana shows her nasty side, Oscar gets curious about Humberto, and a crisis puts everyone on alert.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Loaiza makes a move and Martín asks for help in finding his sister. Meanwhile, Oscar tries to play both sides of the fence.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: As Martín and Sofía start a new phase, Gutiérrez issues a demand. Later, Eliana makes a welcome discovery and Oscar shares a regret.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: A shipment goes awry, Eliana issues a dire warning, and Oscar makes sense of his new surroundings and unyielding enemies.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: A game of soccer takes a deadly turn, Pepe shares his worries with Oscar, and leaders call a meeting that may put an end to the violence.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Revenge becomes a topic of passionate discussion, Martín and Sofía argue over his guilty conscience, and a brutal plan hits a snag.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Martín and Kevin discuss their possible enemies. Meanwhile, Eliana takes a trip and the authorities set a trap that could change everything.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: As Sofía's weariness of Martín's situation grows, the DEA gets tough with Guadaña and Cabo. Also, Juliana gets mixed up in a dangerous situation.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: A brutal trap claims another victim and Cabo unleashes his anger. Meanwhile, Martín considers a career change and Sofía makes a big decision.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: Sofía and Eliana bond over shared troubles, Pepe voices his disappointment in Samuel, and Martín tries to get a handle on business.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: Gutiérrez's bold step leads to more problems, Martín makes a promise to his grandmother, and Pepe lets Samuel in on a secret.
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: Martín shares a rocky reunion with Sofía, Apolinar comes to a bitter realization, and Gutiérrez worries that he lacks leverage.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: When Juliana's car draws unwelcome attention, Anestesia is quick to doubt her story. Meanwhile, Martín disagrees with Sofía's parenting style.
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: Martín issues a warning to Sofía’s boyfriend. Meanwhile, Juanita lands a modeling job, and Anestesia celebrates having made a difficult decision.
episodes.title: Episode 20

episodes.synopsis: Anestesia receives a worrisome note, Martín has a heart-to-heart with his mother, and David Paz keeps everyone on edge.
episodes.title: Episode 21

episodes.synopsis: Buñuelo and Cabo come to an understanding, Ernesto makes a surprise visit, and Anestesia reveals the David Paz connection to Martín.
episodes.title: Episode 22

episodes.synopsis: Martín's distrust of Buñuelo grows, DEA agents struggle to come up with a believable story, and David Paz makes a big request.
episodes.title: Episode 23

episodes.synopsis: Martín tries to tip off Juliana, and a furious Anestesia gets some things off his chest. Meanwhile, a key player goes missing, alarming everyone.
episodes.title: Episode 24

episodes.synopsis: In light of new information, Anestesia faces a difficult choice. Meanwhile, the pressure mounts on Martín to cooperate with authorities.
episodes.title: Episode 25

episodes.synopsis: As Anestesia faces a dose of reality, Martín does what he can to help. Meanwhile, Cabo proposes a deadly solution to a lingering problem.
episodes.title: Episode 26

episodes.synopsis: Anestesia changes his tune, Juliana receives an unexpected visitor, and Apolinar puts a daring plan into place with some help from Martín.
episodes.title: Episode 27

episodes.synopsis: Anestesia learns that freedom comes with a price, Martín launches a dangerous plan, and Juanita receives a warm welcome.
episodes.title: Episode 28

episodes.synopsis: While Martín visits Juliana in prison, Pedro finds himself in difficult circumstances. Later, Pepe makes a promise that could change lives.
episodes.title: Episode 29

episodes.synopsis: Suspicions abound when Martín meets with Anestesia. Meanwhile, Juanita returns to Miami, where she seeks information on what happened to Pedro.
episodes.title: Episode 30

episodes.synopsis: As Guadaña shares a secret with Cabo, Martín confronts Pepe about the DEA, and Anestesia delivers some distressing news.
episodes.title: Episode 31

episodes.synopsis: Martín makes a troubling discovery, and Pirulito keeps Navaja in the dark. Meanwhile, the DEA closes in on a target.
episodes.title: Episode 32

episodes.synopsis: Martín has a tearful reunion, Cabo tries to get to the bottom of a mysterious death, and Pepe and Samuel celebrate a business deal.
episodes.title: Episode 33

episodes.synopsis: As the FBI makes an unexpected house call, Martín begins to make his case in court, and Samuel goes looking for a fight.
episodes.title: Episode 34

episodes.synopsis: Amparo invites Silvio’s wife over for a chat, a drive turns tragic, and Martín receives a double dose of distressing news.
episodes.title: Episode 35

episodes.synopsis: Julio gets a visit from his brother. Meanwhile, Martín’s fortunes take a turn, and a sudden illness takes everyone by surprise.
episodes.title: Episode 36

episodes.synopsis: Martín slips his grandmother out of the country, and Amparo makes a costly demand. Meanwhile, Juanita and Sam have a war of wits.
episodes.title: Episode 37

episodes.synopsis: Juliana questions Sofía's motivations, Amparo's expanding ambitions worry her rivals, and Martín considers going on the offensive.
episodes.title: Episode 38

episodes.synopsis: Martín hears some tough news from his lawyer, and Pepe gets a long-overdue visitor. Meanwhile, Amparo makes a dangerous request.
episodes.title: Episode 39

episodes.synopsis: Eliana returns home, Samuel takes a stand, Fermín receives a worrisome warning, and Pepe reconnects with an old rival.
episodes.title: Episode 40

episodes.synopsis: Eliana makes a plea to Amparo as an impatient Martín clashes with an employee. Meanwhile, Pepe and Santilla find a common enemy.
episodes.title: Episode 41

episodes.synopsis: Guadaña starts putting two and two together, Pepe receives an offer from the FBI, and Sofía and Martín share an emotional goodbye.
episodes.title: Episode 42

episodes.synopsis: Martín points the finger at a former ally, Samuel fears for his wife's safety, Guadaña proves his ruthlessness, and Fermín makes a change.
episodes.title: Episode 43

episodes.synopsis: Gutiérrez faces a tough homecoming, the FBI wants Martín's cooperation, and the war between Cabo and Samuel escalates.
episodes.title: Episode 44

episodes.synopsis: Fermín and Gutiérrez find life to be dangerously unpredictable. Meanwhile, Martín visits Pepe in prison, where they discuss old times.
episodes.title: Episode 45

episodes.synopsis: While at a party, Guadaña threatens Gutiérrez. Later, Buñuelo gets a glimpse into his future and doesn't like what he sees.
episodes.title: Episode 46

episodes.synopsis: Cabo offers to help Guadaña with his love life, Samuel and Ana hit the town, Juanita passes along some bad news, and Martín gets squeezed.
episodes.title: Episode 47

episodes.synopsis: Buñuelo finds himself in front of a tough crowd, a pool party is rudely interrupted, and Martín's circumstances change in an instant.
episodes.title: Episode 48

episodes.synopsis: After a rough day, Martín struggles with his emotions. Meanwhile, Buñuelo seeks help from Cabo and Pepe's plans go up in smoke.
episodes.title: Episode 49

episodes.synopsis: As Mario worries about his family's safety, Juanita makes a desperate plea. Meanwhile, Juliana’s mother visits Martín with disturbing news.
episodes.title: Episode 50

episodes.synopsis: Martín arrives in Panama, where he's immediately put to work. Meanwhile, Mario seeks information and Buñuelo seeks protection.
episodes.title: Episode 51

episodes.synopsis: Mocho works on a deal that may save his family, Martín makes new enemies, and Amparo's personality fails to charm.
episodes.title: Episode 52

episodes.synopsis: Amparo learns that money talks, even in prison. Meanwhile, Gutiérrez delivers some news that puts Cabo and Pirulito in a nasty mood.
episodes.title: Episode 53

episodes.synopsis: Pirulito sets a savage trap, a mysterious computer file may hold the key to untold riches, and Martín's advice is brushed aside.
episodes.title: Episode 54

episodes.synopsis: Gutiérrez shares a radical idea with Jorge. Meanwhile, Cabo issues a timely ultimatum and Martín's well-planned rescue efforts hit a snag.
episodes.title: Episode 55

episodes.synopsis: Pirulito seeks a violent end to a troublesome problem, Buñuelo's trip is cut short, and Martín reconnects with an old friend.
episodes.title: Episode 56

episodes.synopsis: Martín's fate is decided in court, Mario proposes an end to the war with Cabo, and two old friends meet under dark circumstances.
episodes.title: Episode 57
